Name: Football Match
Description: A football match is a discrete game of association football (soccer) played between two opposing teams.

Properties.Name: Assistant Referees
Properties.Description: The assistants to the referee for this match

Properties.Name: Attendance
Properties.Description: The spectator attendance at the stadium for this game

Properties.Name: Held at
Properties.Description: The stadium or football field this game was held at

Properties.Name: Teams
Properties.Description: The two teams who participated in this game.
